forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clouds and some sun this morning with more clouds for this afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 33F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low -6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 21F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with a mix of light rain and snow later in the day. High 4C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy with a mixture of rain and snow showers developing in the afternoon. High near 40F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Watching a potential winter storm. Periods of snow. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Watching a potential winter storm. Periods of snow. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Watching a potential winter storm. Periods of snow. High around 0C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Watching a potential winter storm. Snow during the morning will give way to lingering snow showers during the afternoon. High 31F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early with a chance of lingering snow showers later. Low -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few snow showers later at night. Low near 20F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. A few flurries or snow showers possible. High -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. A few flurries or snow showers possible. High around 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers becoming a steady accumulating snow later on. Low -6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Light snow in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low 21F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers will become more widely scattered in the afternoon. High -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with snow showers during the morning. High 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early will become steadier snow overnight. Low -6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early will become steadier snow overnight. Low 21F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. High -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. High 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 19F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed mostly cloudy skies and a few snow showers later in the day. High -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed mostly cloudy skies and a few snow showers later in the day. High 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 19F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. High around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low near 25F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of winter precipitation in the morning will transition to a mixture of light rain and freezing rain in the afternoon. High near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of mixed winter precipitation. High 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 24F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 24F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
